author: tylrbrock
text: Imagine if they took this much time, effort and money into making more units and assuring better distribution at launch instead of pointless promotions.

author: tylrbrock
text: Nah someone’s just got common sense. This launch is a cluster fuck.

author: whatwoow
text: I hope you get one soon so you can relax a bit and realize how solid that wordplay was...

author: Bags2525
text: Did you expect anything different have you looked at the launch of any other console it's always like this and this photo is not real either so put your club away bam bam

author: tylrbrock
text:
Lol this is nothing like previous launches.

I’ve around since the Atari 2600 son. I’ve lived them all. This was a cluster fuck Xbox and PS launch.

author: Bags2525
text: I've been around for several of them as well son and it's always the same s*** there's a limited amount when they come out they always come out at Christmas time and then people are scalping them for $800 or $1,000 on the internet this happens literally every single time so you're delusional

text: Nah, ps4 was a piece of piss to get at launch.

text: I literally read all of the same stories about shortages for the PS4 as well

text: You didnt live them all there where systems before the 2600

text:
